page.title: 14Businesses in Felton Village
page.content: An elderly lady said "Once upon a time Felton was a very busy little place, but lots of shops have closed." Now there are two food shops,one of which is also a butchers.There is an ironmongers,a sub post office,a news- agents and three antique shops.One antique shop is also a cafe another one stocks knitting wool and clothing. there is a hairdresser,a blacksmith and a furniture maker.The Milk Marketing Board has an office in the old Martins Bank building.There are two public houses.There is a road haulage business which has been in Felton for a lot of years.It has two yards called "Big Hare's and little Hare's" It used to have petrol pumps and a transport cafe but these are no longer in public use.
